title: Please follow? :3
body: heeeeeeeeeeeeeey, uhm haha hi, would you be able to do me a HUUUUUUUGE favour? :3 could you pleae please follow my tumblr? its howboutnein.tumblr.com please it would mean so much to me ^_^

replies.body:
Do you play LoL?
Do you post LoL themed stuff?


If not, this isn't the place to post for attention.
